name: Jesiel Sopzak Campos
description: Hello, my name is Jesiel and I am looking for a job in your company. But I'll only work there if: the team is fantastic, the atmosphere is welcoming and if the appraiser has a great sense of humor. Maybe I am not the best candidate, but the places I have been to and the people I have lived with have always gotten better with me, and I also grew up with them. I am looking for a new challenge for me and my family, and if everything goes well we will live in Canada, but even then we will call it home.

replays.name: Winston Churchill
replays.description: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.

replays.name: Andrew Carnegie
replays.description: The average person puts only 25% of his energy into his work. The world takes off its hat to those who put in more than 50% of their capacity, and stands on its head for those few and far between souls who devote 100%.

name: Winston Churchill
description: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.

name: Og Mandino
description: Failure Will Never Overtake Me If My Determination To Succeed Is Strong Enough.

name: Maya Angelou
description: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.
